Items.Name: Mat
Items.LookDescription: A rubber mat with the words 'Welcome to Zork!' written on it lies here.
Items.InvDescription: A rubber mat with the words 'Welcome to Zork!' written on it.

Items.Name: Mailbox
Items.InvDescription: A small mailbox. Hey, why are you holdin' a mailbox, silly???

Items.Name: Sword
Items.LookDescription: An Elvish sword of Ancient Antiquity lies here.
Items.InvDescription: An Elvish sword of Ancient Antiquity.

Enemies.Name: Troll
Enemies.LivingDescription: A large, Green Troll stands before you. It holds a large club and is coming to attack you.
Enemies.DeadDescription: The dead body of the troll lies here.
Enemies.PlayerKilledText: The troll swings his club down onto you, killing you instantly.
Enemies.TrollKilledText: You attack the troll and strike him down. He lets out a roar as he dies.

Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field next to a white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the North side of a white house. There is no door here, all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the South side of a white house. There is no door here, all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the East, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you to the West and South.

Rooms.Name: Inside House
Rooms.Description: You are in a single large room that seems to take up the entire house. The open window is at the east end of the room.
